short.ar: This convenient Chrome extension allows effortless downloading of high-resolution images from Shein listings in bulk or…
short.am: Easily gather and save high-quality photos of your favorite items on Shein using this uncomplicated download extension, no coding…
short.bg: Quickly amass and archive Shein product images for any purpose with this straightforward one-click download extension.
short.bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: Export SHEIN product information to a CSV file and download the product images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
👨🏻‍💻 Features
✓ Export product into a CSV file
✓ Download the images of the product without watermarks
✓ Get the highest quality images
✓ Save the images as .ZIP files

📬 Contact
If you have any questions or suggestions to improve the extension, please feel free to contact us at jfl913@gmail.com.

🔒 Data Privacy
All the data you process stays on your local computer and never goes through our servers.
